name: Chasca
desc:

Grace and power resound, feathered wings skybound.

value.name: Bullet Trick
value.desc:
Chasca: Bullet Trick

"Fire in the hole!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Chasca to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Chasca
value.desc: The Peacemaker of the Tlalocan, the ender of all disputes.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deal 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> and draw 1 card.
Attach <color=#ffffff>Soulsniper: Ritual Staff</color> to this character, who then enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> and gains 2 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> . (This skill cannot be used after the character enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> ) (Characters with <color=#ffffff>Soulsniper: Ritual Staff</color> attached can use the Technique: <color=#ffffff>Multitarget Fire</color> )
<color=#ffffff>The next 2 times you switch Characters:</color> Draw 1 card.
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached accumulates <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> . (Max 2 points)

<color=#ffd780>Technique</color>
Consumes 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> , deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , then randomly <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> 3 cards from your Hand with the highest original Elemental Dice Cost.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby. Draw 3 cards.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
At the start of each match, add 6 random <color=#ffffff>Shadowhunt Shell</color> to your Deck.

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>Technique</color> : Multitarget Fire.
When this card is discarded, the <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> of the character to which this is attached ends.
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)

<color=#ffd780>Event Card</color>
<color=#ffffff>When this card is added to your Hand:</color> If your active character is Pyro/Hydro/Electro/Cryo, convert this card to the corresponding element.
<color=#ffffff>When this card is played or you Discard it:</color> Prioritize dealing 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> / <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> / <color=#80c0ff>Hydro DMG</color> / <color=#ffacff>Electro DMG</color> / <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> to the opponent's active character, then randomly add 1 Shadowhunt Shell to your deck.

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Technique</color>
When the active character is equipped with a Technique card, they can use the corresponding Technique.
Using a Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the Technique.
Using a Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

customize.name: Chasca
customize.desc:
"Skyborne Arbiter" Chasca

Grace and power resound, feathered wings skybound.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Alright, let's do battle with these cards."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Chasca's deck is built around the Discard mechanic. She relies on switching characters and drawing cards to deal massive bursts of damage.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:
"Skyborne Arbiter" Chasca

Grace and power resound, feathered wings skybound.

customize.name: Xinyan
customize.desc:
"Blazing Riff" Xinyan

Time to rock!

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc:
"Pearl of Wisdom" Sangonomiya Kokomi

To survive hardship, you must prepare for hardship.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
